languages.text: "Не сомневаюсь в ваших боевых навыках". {n}Уголок губ Соломона самую капельку приподнимается в испытующей недо-улыбке.{/n}
"I don't doubt your skills in combat." {n}The corner of Solomorne's lips lifts ever so slightly in a quizzical, not-quite-smile.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Не сомневаюсь в ваших боевых навыках". {n}Уголок губ Соломона самую капельку приподнимается в испытующей недо-улыбке.{/n}

languages.text: « Je ne doute pas de vos aptitudes au combat. » {n}Un quasi-sourire interrogateur se dessine sur les lèvres de Solomorne.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I don't doubt your skills in combat." {n}The corner of Solomorne's lips lifts ever so slightly in a quizzical, not-quite-smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je ne doute pas de vos aptitudes au combat. » {n}Un quasi-sourire interrogateur se dessine sur les lèvres de Solomorne.{/n}

languages.text: 「あなたの戦闘スキルを疑っているわけではありませんよ」{n}ソロモーンの口元がわずかに持ち上がり、わずかに面白がるような、しかし笑みとは言えない表情を浮かべた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I don't doubt your skills in combat." {n}The corner of Solomorne's lips lifts ever so slightly in a quizzical, not-quite-smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの戦闘スキルを疑っているわけではありませんよ」{n}ソロモーンの口元がわずかに持ち上がり、わずかに面白がるような、しかし笑みとは言えない表情を浮かべた。{/n}

languages.text: «No pongo en duda su habilidad en combate». {n}La comisura de los labios de Solomorne se elevan ligeramente, esbozando una enigmática media sonrisa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I don't doubt your skills in combat." {n}The corner of Solomorne's lips lifts ever so slightly in a quizzical, not-quite-smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No pongo en duda su habilidad en combate». {n}La comisura de los labios de Solomorne se elevan ligeramente, esbozando una enigmática media sonrisa.{/n}

languages.text: “我一点都不怀疑你的战斗技巧。”{n}索罗蒙嘴角微微上扬，露出了古怪的笑容，看起来毫无笑意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I don't doubt your skills in combat." {n}The corner of Solomorne's lips lifts ever so slightly in a quizzical, not-quite-smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我一点都不怀疑你的战斗技巧。”{n}索罗蒙嘴角微微上扬，露出了古怪的笑容，看起来毫无笑意。{/n}

languages.text: "Çatışma kabiliyetinizden şüphem yok." {n}Solomorne'un dudaklarına gülümsemeyi andıran, alaycı bir ifade yerleşiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I don't doubt your skills in combat." {n}The corner of Solomorne's lips lifts ever so slightly in a quizzical, not-quite-smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Savaş kabiliyetinizden şüphem yok." {n}Solomorne'un dudaklarına gülümsemeyi andıran, alaycı bir ifade yerleşiveriyor.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich zweifle nicht an Eurem Kampfgeschick." {n}Solomorne verzieht seine Mundwinkel zur Andeutung eines Lächelns.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I don't doubt your skills in combat." {n}The corner of Solomorne's lips lifts ever so slightly in a quizzical, not-quite-smile.{/n}
